actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-671.

official_title: A resolution authorizing additional governmental operations with respect to intelligence activities.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-671) Extends until March 15, 1976, the date for submission of the final report of the Select Committee to Study Governmental Operations with Respect to Intelligence Activities. Gives the select committee until May 31, 1976, to close its affairs. Directs that the expenses of the select committee from March 1, 1976, through May 31, 1976, shall not exceed $300,000. Allocates $5,000 of such sum to be expended for the procurement of individual consultants or organizations thereof.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing additional governmental operations with respect to intelligence activities.
